snippet.title: Brawlout - Hyper Light Drifter Reveal - Out Now on Nintendo Switch
snippet.description:
Available Now on Nintendo Switch™: https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/brawlout-switch

Brawlout packs a punch with couch and online play modes, blending platform fighter mechanics and traditional fighting game play into a stylish and fluid battle royale.

Hyper Light Drifter, from the hard-hitting indie gem of the same name, is set to unsheathe his light sword against the competitors of Brawlout.
